1011111011001001 1011110100011011 1 -> sum: 0111101111100101, cout: 1
0110010001011111 0010100101011110 1 -> sum: 1000110110111110, cout: 0
1001000001111010 1000100001010011 0 -> sum: 0001100011001101, cout: 1
0011101010011100 0100001101000010 1 -> sum: 0111110111011111, cout: 0
0010010100111001 1010111111111100 0 -> sum: 1101010100110101, cout: 0
1100111111000100 0110001100100111 0 -> sum: 0011001011101011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
